title: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package'
description: When trying to copy a package in jdt.ui, the destination folder is shown as 'xxx' instead of 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'. This behavior can be observed in the following steps:
OB: The destination folder is shown as 'xxx' when trying to copy a package in jdt.ui.
EB: The destination folder should be shown as 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' when trying to copy a package in jdt.ui.
SR:
1. Open jdt.ui.
2. Select a package to copy.
3. Right-click and choose 'Copy Package'.
4. Observe the destination folder.
